metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2334 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the NArchive::NHfs::CHandler::ExtractZlibFilemethod in 7zip before 16.00 and p7zip allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted HFS+ image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2334` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

p7zip - 16.02+dfsg-6
p7zip-full - 16.02+dfsg-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: p7zip package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '16.02+dfsg-6').
